summary: One winter morning, while driving through the desolate French countryside, traveler Charlotte picks up hitchhiker Max. Together they stop at a roadside diner, where a strange and depraved horror awaits.
cast: Yolande Moreau|Émilie Dequenne|Benjamin Biolay|Philippe Nahon|Matthias Schoenaerts|Ian Fonteyn|Georges Lini|Philippe Résimont|Brice Fournier|Nicolas Leroy|Mathieu Bouteligier|François Doms|Benoît Vivien|Eric Godon|Joris Strickx|Mamy Camara|Boris Van Wambeke|Jean-Marie Barbier|Alexia De Coster|Boris Chevrier|Linda Camamero
keywords: woman with a gun|diner|two word title|hanging upside down|burning house
title: La meute
